package.name: gcc54
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-build SED=sed export SED if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc /usr/local/gcc64/bin/gcc64" export CXX="distcc /usr/local/gcc64/bin/g++64" else export CC='/usr/local/gcc64/bin/gcc64' export CXX='/usr/local/gcc64/bin/g++64' fi jobcount=4 ../gcc-${PKGVERSION}/configure --prefix=/usr/local/${PKGNAME} \ --enable-shared --disable-libsanitizer \ --enable-threads=posix --enable-__cxa_atexit \ --enable-clocale=gnu --enable-languages=c,c++,fortran,java,lto,objc,obj-c++ \ --disable-multilib --with-system-zlib --program-suffix=54 --disable-bootstrap make -j $jobcount
